thread.title: BRIEF-Steinhoff Africa Retail Says Vusumuzi Khanyile Resigns As Independent Non-Executive Director

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Steinhoff Africa Retail Says Vusumuzi Khanyile Resigns As Independent Non-Executive Director

organizations.name: brief-steinhoff africa retail says vusumuzi khanyile resigns as independent

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Steinhoff Africa Retail Ltd:
* STEINHOFF AFRICA RETAIL - VUSUMUZI PHILIP KHANYILE HAS RESIGNED AS AN INDEPENDENT NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR FROM BOARD OF STAR, WITH EFFECT FROM 10 JANUARY 2018​
* ‍JOHANN BERNARD CILLIERS HAS BEEN APPOINTED AS MEMBER OF NOMINATIONS COMMITTEE, WITH EFFECT FROM 10 JANUARY 2018​
* STEINHOFF AFRICA RETAIL - ‍DANIEL MAREE VAN DER MERWE APPOINTED AS MEMBER OF HUMAN RESOURCES AND REMUNERATION COMMITTEE, WITH EFFECT FROM 10 JAN 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
